com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client

Class DataViewColumn

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.DataViewColumn

  • public class DataViewColumn
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
    Represents a calculated column. A calculated column creates a value on the fly for each row and adds it to the view.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected DataViewColumn() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DataViewColumn create(ColumnFunction columnFunction, ColumnType type)
      Default constructor.
      static DataViewColumn create(int sourceColumn)
      Creates a new column This is similar to passing in a number instead of an object, but enables you to specify a role and properties for the new column.
      void setCalc(ColumnFunction columnFunction)
      Sets a function that will be called for each row in the column to calculate a value for that cell.
      void setId(String id)
      Sets an id for the column.
      void setLabel(String label)
      Sets a label for the column.
      void setPattern(String pattern)
      Sets a pattern specifying how to display the column value.
      void setProperties(Properties properties)
      Sets an object containing any arbitrary properties to assign to this column.
      void setRole(RoleType role)
      Sets a role for the column.
      void setSourceColumn(int sourceColumn)
      Sets the source column to use as a value; if specified, do not specify the calc or the type property.
      void setType(ColumnType type)
      Sets a type for the column.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static DataViewColumn create(ColumnFunction columnFunction,
                    ColumnType type)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        columnFunction - a function for calculating each row value
        type - data type of the data in the column.
        Returns:
        the new column

      • create

        public static DataViewColumn create(int sourceColumn)
        Creates a new column This is similar to passing in a number instead of an object, but enables you to specify a role and properties for the new column.
        Parameters:
        sourceColumn -
        Returns:
        the new column

      • setCalc

        public final void setCalc(ColumnFunction columnFunction)
        Sets a function that will be called for each row in the column to calculate a value for that cell.
        Parameters:
        columnFunction - a function for calculating each row value

      • setId

        public final void setId(String id)
        Sets an id for the column.
        Parameters:
        id - an id for the column

      • setLabel

        public final void setLabel(String label)
        Sets a label for the column.
        Parameters:
        label - a label for the column

      • setPattern

        public final void setPattern(String pattern)
        Sets a pattern specifying how to display the column value.
        Parameters:
        pattern - number (or date) format string specifying how to display the column value

      • setProperties

        public final void setProperties(Properties properties)
        Sets an object containing any arbitrary properties to assign to this column. If not specified, the view column will have no properties.
        Parameters:
        properties - a map of custom values applied to the cell.

      • setRole

        public final void setRole(RoleType role)
        Sets a role for the column. If not specified, the existing role will not be imported.
        Parameters:
        role - a role for the column

      • setSourceColumn

        public final void setSourceColumn(int sourceColumn)
        Sets the source column to use as a value; if specified, do not specify the calc or the type property. This is similar to passing in a number instead of an object, but enables you to specify a role and properties for the new column.
        Parameters:
        sourceColumn - a source column to use as a value

      • setType

        public final void setType(ColumnType type)
        Sets a type for the column. Used as type of the value that the calc function returns
        Parameters:
        type - a type for the column
